snippet: Sub-investment-grade bonds have been excellent investments over the past year, but yields have recently fallen to record lows as prices have risen.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column notes that sub-investment-grade bonds have been excellent investments over the past year, but warns that yields have recently fallen to record lows as prices have risen.
lead_paragraph: Sub-investment-grade bonds have been excellent investments over the past year, but yields have recently fallen to record lows as prices have risen.
